text.text: All day sun with well sheltered areas
Over 3 acres of developed land, featuring a permaculture garden design
Living area heated by woodburner with integrated water heating
Large laundry with walk-in linen room
Bathroom with bath and separate shower
Situated 3 kilometres south west of Sawyers Bay in a rural setting, 10 kilometres north of the Octagon
The dwelling is very well orientated with the living areas having a northerly aspect
Handy to trendy Port Chalmers galleries and shops

text.title: Permaculture
text.text: This property is based on permaculture principles and includes a integrated forest garden of fruit trees, berry bushes, and vegetables designed by Jason Ross. A herb spiral, raised veggie beds, glasshouse, and composting area. It also includes a worm farm, chicken coop, tool shed and a large barn. We are currently grazing 4 sheep, 4 chickens and a horse

text.title: History
text.text: Originally farmed by the Goddard family which grew vegetables and strawberries on this very fertile land.
If you would like more information, please reach out to me at southernwoman2@hotmail.com
